name: MLGazetteer
desc: A collection of terms and their labels, which augments a tagger that analyzes natural language text.

items.name: init(dictionary: [String : [String]], parameters: MLGazetteer.ModelParameters)
items.desc: Creates a gazetteer from a set of labels for terms represented by a dictionary.

items.name: init(labeledData: MLDataTable, textColumn: String, labelColumn: String, parameters: MLGazetteer.ModelParameters)
items.desc: Creates a gazetteer from a set of labels for terms represented by a data table.

items.name: struct MLGazetteer.ModelParameters
items.desc: The parameters that configure a gazetteer.

items.name: let modelParameters: MLGazetteer.ModelParameters
items.desc: The configuration parameters that the gazetteer used during initialization.

items.name: func prediction(from: String) -> String
items.desc: Retrieves the label for the given term.

items.name: func predictions(from: [String]) -> [String]
items.desc: Retrieves the labels for the given terms.

items.name: func predictions(from: MLDataColumn<String>) -> MLDataColumn<String>
items.desc: Retrieves the labels for the terms represented in a data table.

items.name: func write(to: URL, metadata: MLModelMetadata?)
items.desc: Exports the gazetteer contained within a Core ML model file at the given URL.

items.name: func write(toFile: String, metadata: MLModelMetadata?)
items.desc: Exports the gazetteer contained within a Core ML model file at the given file path.

items.name: var model: MLModel
items.desc: The gazetteer contained within a Core ML model file stored in memory.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the gazetteer.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the gazetteer thatâ€™s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the gazetteer shown in a playground.
